predicate.note: Frames file for 'cart' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to convey in a car or truck

example.name: with direction
example.text: At closing time , farmers cart out most of what they carted [*T*-1] in .
example.arg: most of what they carted [*T*-1] in

roleset.name: to take away in a car or truck

example.name: participle
example.text: American journalist William L. Shirer , in his book `` The Rise and Fall of the Third Reich , '' wrote of how in Vienna he had witnessed `` squads of } Nazi { SS men carting off silver , tapestries , paintings and other loot from the Rothschild palace [*T*-2] . ''
example.arg: silver , tapestries , paintings and other loot
